title: Tom Olsson's Cohuna
creator_contributor_role: Cohuna Historical Society Productions, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Cities and towns
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Social life and customs
abstract: Cohuna - A special glimpse into rural life in 1950's Victoria
description: Cohuna - When Cohuna Higher Elementary School wanted to raise money for a film projector in 1952, local resident Tom Olsson decided to help by filming life in the township and surrounding countryside, and then showing the footage in the local Town Hall. His footage has been lovingly compiled by the Cohuna Historical Society and the resulting film give us a special glimpse into rural life in 1950's Victoria. The school recieved their projector, and Olsson's films were shown annually as a Christmas treat for many years afterward.
